00032 #ifndef _U300_RIL_MISC_H
00033 #define _U300_RIL_MISC_H 1
00034 
00035 #include <stdbool.h>
00036 
00037 /* Used in a quick test to determine whether the SIM is 2G or 3G.
00038  * Note, this value is actually hex in the returned header, but 
00039  * the algorithm in the code converts it into a decimal number
00040  * so this constant needs to be decimal. Ask me how I know.
00041  */
00042 #define FCP_TEMPLATE_BYTE 62
00043 
00044 struct tlv {
00045     unsigned    tag;
00046     const char *data;
00047     const char *end;
00048 };
00049 
00051 int strStartsWith(const char *line, const char *prefix);
00052 
00053 char *getFirstElementValue(const char* document,
00054                            const char* elementBeginTag,
00055                            const char* elementEndTag,
00056                            char** remainingDocument);
00057 
00058 int stringToBinary(/*in*/ const char *string,
00059                    /*in*/ size_t len,
00060                    /*out*/ unsigned char *binary);
00061 
00062 int binaryToString(/*in*/ const unsigned char *binary,
00063                    /*in*/ size_t len,
00064                    /* out */ char *string );
00065 
00066 bool is3GSim( /* in */ const char *stream );
00067 
00068 char char2nib(char c);
00069 
00070 void hexToUpper( char *strp, int len );
00071 
00072 int parseTlv(/*in*/ const char *stream,
00073                 /*in*/ const char *end,
00074              /*out*/ struct tlv *tlv);
00075 
00076 #define TLV_DATA(tlv, pos) (((unsigned)char2nib(tlv.data[(pos) * 2 + 0]) << 4) | \
00077                            ((unsigned)char2nib(tlv.data[(pos) * 2 + 1]) << 0))
00078 #endif
